title: Best value
comment: Works fine and like the unexpected storage under the seat.

I received my Robera Pro February 15, 2025. I Played 4 rounds using it as weather would permit. My seat arrived one month later. The Robera experience was exactly what I was hoping for. Caddy golf. It doesn't get any better than that. Until my seat arrived. Being able to sit for a moment during my round just made the experience complete. Like frosting on a cake. The seat made the next two rounds better. I look forward to the next round with anticipation. Going again tomorrow! Fairways and greens from Ft. Worth, Texas.
